## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9d5dd7c674d7944a4a007067b003b935d5262241467fa2a8733f6d03875521ee)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'shopping-cart-service' @ 1.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
